MASEventService.Name: TemplateEvents
MASEventService.Description: The idea of an account template is to preset some of the fields required by core subscriber or department accounts of the selected corporate or department account. The accounts that it applies to can be immediate descendants or all descendant accounts of the account for which you're defining the template.

EventMethod.Name: StartTemplateWorkflow
EventMethod.Description: Method to initiate a template's wporkflow

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: AccountIdentifier
Parameter.Description: Parameter used to identify an account

EventMethod.Name: StartMoveTemplateWorkflow
EventMethod.Description: Method to initiate the moving of a template workflow

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: AccountIdentifier
Parameter.Description: Parameter used to identify an account

Parameter.Name: MoveAccountsString
Parameter.Description: String parameter representing MoveAccounts

Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

EventMethod.Name: OKApplyTemplate
EventMethod.Description: Method to verify the application of a template

Parameter.Name: AccountId
Parameter.Description: This is a ref parameter identifying the user account

Parameter.Name: ApplyPropertiesString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the properties of the parent template to be applied to the new template

Parameter.Name: ApplySubscriptionsString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing subscriptions to apply to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyDefaultSecurityString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the default seciruty string to apply to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyAllDescendentsString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the descendents to be applied to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyStartDateString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the start date to apply to the new template

Parameter.Name: ApplyEndDateString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the end date to apply to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyStartNextBillingPeriodString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the start of the next billing period to apply to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyEndNextBillingPeriodString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the end of the next billing period to apply to the template

Parameter.Name: ApplyEndConflictingSubscriptionsString
Parameter.Description: Parameter representing the conflicting subscriptions to be ended
